title: ADR evidence receipts and cross-link governance
context: Architecture decisions need immutable evidence trails like PR merges and validations. Without receipts, decisions can be altered or disputed without audit trail.
decision: Implement ADR governance with canonical JSON receipts and mandatory cross-link validation. Each ADR must reference exactly one decision receipt, and each receipt must be referenced by an ADR.
consequences: All architecture decisions have cryptographic integrity proofs. CI enforces cross-link policy preventing orphan receipts or undocumented decisions.
